sys_ux_client_script.name: simpleListModal

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_9cae5dab1b454d10b81fdce7cc4bcb26
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Simple List">bf9e5dab1b454d10b81fdce7cc4bcb0e</macroponent><name>simpleListModal</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
        api,
        event,
        imports,
        helpers
    }) {
    
    const { name, payload: { route, fields, params, size = 'md' }} = event;
    
    if (name === 'SIMPLE_LIST#OPEN_MODAL') {
        if (!route)
            return;
            
        api.setState('bare', true);
        api.setState('displayOptions', { size: size });
        api.setState('contents', {
            route: route,
            fields: fields,
            params: params
        });
    }
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-20 16:38:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>9cae5dab1b454d10b81fdce7cc4bcb26</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>simpleListModal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9cae5dab1b454d10b81fdce7cc4bcb26</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-20 16:39:02</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
